titleStmt.title: J. F. Rodgers to James F. Robinson
CWG7664

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1862-1863

creation.placeName: Rough and Ready, Anderson County, Kentucky

body.p:
Rough & Ready Anderson Co. Ky
Aug 21st 1862
Gov Jas. F. Robinson
Dear Sir
this is in reference to an appointment as Surgeon in the U.S. aArmy
Believing that you have the appointing power I solicit the appointment and refer you to Dr Wm. C. Sneed and Hon Jas. Harlan as to my moral character qualifications and fitness for the position

yours very
Respectfully
J. F. Rodgers M D.

J. F Rogers M D
Rough & Ready
to be ansd
